synopsis.text: Bai Hehuai, the prodigious doctor from Medicine King Valley, is summoned by Su Muyu, the leader of the elite guard group Spider Shadow, to save the life of their poisoned patriarch. The patriarch leads Anhe, a clandestine and enigmatic assassin organization, comprised of three powerful families: Su, Xie, and Mu. As the patriarch clings to life, the three factions within Anhe seize the opportunity to revolt. Amidst the chaos, Su Muyu must fend off rival assassins and protect the patriarch at all costs. Meanwhile, Su Changhe, Su Muyu's close friend within Anhe, finds himself on the opposing side as he joins the Su family's plot to assassinate the patriarch.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
